15 Quotes to Read Before You Go to Sleep

Both the quality and quantity of our sleep have a profound impact on our health, and the way we spend the last few moments of the day before we drift off to sleep can impact  the entire night’s rest. If anxiety and stress creep in, it’s a good bet we’ll be tossing and turning into the night. Alternatively, if we take a moment to fill our minds with positive thoughts and gratitude before bed, there’s a better chance of us catching some good-quality zz's.

To set the tone for a good night’s sleep, it’s important not only to keep a consistent bedtime and routine, but also to calm our minds. This collection of comforting passages, relaxing thoughts, and stress-relieving mantras can help you wind down each night, ensuring a peaceful drift-off. It’s the best way to wake up with renewed energy and motivation to tackle the challenges of a new day.

Put your thoughts to sleep, do not let them cast a shadow over the moon of your heart.
Rumi

Share Quote

The sky grew darker, painted blue on blue, one stroke at a time, into deeper and deeper shades of night.
Haruki Murakami

Share Quote

Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
William S. Burroughs

Share Quote

Even a soul submerged in sleep is hard at work and helps make something of the world.
Heraclitus, philosopher

Share Quote

You cannot perceive beauty, but with a serene mind.
Henry David Thoreau

Share Quote

You are the sky. Everything else — it's just the weather.
Pema Chödrön, Buddhist teacher

Share Quote

Don’t you simply love going to bed. To curl up warmly in a nice warm bed, in the lovely darkness, that is so restful and then gradually drift away into sleep…
C.S. Lewis

Share Quote

Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
Thích Nhất Hạnh

Share Quote

Silence is the element in which great things fashion themselves together; that at length they may emerge, full-formed and majestic, into the daylight of life.
Thomas Carlyle, essayist

Share Quote

There is a calmness to a life lived in gratitude, a quiet joy.
Ralph H. Blum, author

Share Quote

Set peace of mind as your highest goal and organize your entire life around it.
Brian Tracy, motivational speaker

Share Quote

The best bridge between despair and hope is a good night's sleep.
E. Joseph Cossman, inventor

Share Quote

True silence is the rest of the mind, and is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
William Penn, writer

Share Quote

Happiness consists in getting enough sleep. Just that, nothing more.
 Robert A. Heinlein, author

Share Quote

This is the ending. Now not day only shall be beloved, but night too shall be beautiful and blessed and all its fear pass away!
J.R.R. Tolkien

Share Quote

About the Author
Nicole Villeneuve
Nicole is a writer, thrift store lover, and group-chat meme spammer based in Ontario, Canada.
Daily Question
Who said, "All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them"?

More Inspiration

Letting go gives us freedom, and freedom is the only condition for happiness.

Thích Nhất Hạnh

The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.

Carl Jung

We are all of us obliged... to nurse a few little follies in ourselves.

Marcel Proust

Injustice makes the rules, and courage breaks them.

Ursula K. Le Guin

Compassion is an unstable emotion. It needs to be translated into action, or it withers.

Susan Sontag

You can only understand people if you feel them in yourself.

John Steinbeck

We are all born worthy. Worthy of love, worthy of success.

Jamie Lee Curtis

If we go for the easy way, we never change.

Marina Abramović

A genius is the one most like himself.

Thelonius Monk

Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.

Amelia Earhart

Only the truth of who you are, if realized, will set you free.

Eckhart Tolle
